section.p: As you are an important member of the Court of Hidden Faces, the Satrap of Kunrir invites you to stay in the palace.
Your rooms are plush and lavish. You also have a staff of several servants to feed you, and dress you in the mornings. It is luxury.

You can leave possessions and money here to save having to carry them around with you. You can also rest here safely, and recover any Stamina points you have lost. Record in the box anything you wish to leave. When you have finished, you can:

choices.choice: Go to the House of Sweet Repose
